alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 9:34PM EDT until July 11 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water floods Riverside Road at Kent School and begins to approach buildings. Water gets close to Route 7. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.6 feet later tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.6 feet on 04/12/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 9 pm: 8.3 Forecast: Mon 10 pm 8.4 Tue 4 am 8.5 Tue 10 am 7.2 Tue 4 pm 5.4 Tue 10 pm 4.4 &&
